author: jvincentedja
title: Leveling Up Cardano Indonesia IG
description: In need of leveling up our Instagram to reach out and engage more masses through CardanoIndonesia Instagram.

f6_assessments.q0: I don't think this proposal is so fruitful for the challenge. Our objective here is to finance projects that can benefit East Asian countries and their residents, generating employment opportunities in the technology field or even as CAs and vCAs by Catalyst, in other words, helping the inhabitants of the countries of this geographic region. to be able to work and earn an income through Cardano's opportunities; educate local populations about what blockchain is, what is the difference between ours and others, educate them about the advantages of buying and delegating Ada, in short, favoring them in different ways through the possibilities found in our community. This in alignment, of course, with the benefit of the Cardano ecosystem, after all we would be funding projects and we need to have some kind of return, which in this case is to popularize our blockchain in East Asia, make it grow there, so that new people join the community and investments increase. In this case, the present proposal even promises to popularize the teachings about Cardano through content released on instagram, but that would be for the Indonesian public, which is not in the geographic region that is the focus of the challenge. I also think that the asking value of 6k is a little high for what was promised, so that the marketing of this page is intensified. There is already a lot of content about Cardano, especially in English, on youtube, I confess that on instagram we don't have such a strong base, much less if it's for the Indonesian audience. In this sense, in fact, the proposal is innovative and important, as it would help bring content relevant to our ecosystem to a different audience, and one of the goals of our blockchain is to make it accessible to everyone, democratic, and undoubtedly the biggest barrier that we find is linguistics. Therefore, I think that if two things were different here, this proposal deserved a maximum grade: if the amount requested in the financing was more adequate for the activities developed (I say this based on many proposals that I evaluated, usually they all separate a part for marketing , but not as high as 6k); and if this instagram profile was aimed at a specific audience in East Asia, as the challenge aims, whether in Japan, China, etc. Therefore, I will give it 3 stars, reinforcing that the idea is good but does not align perfectly with the specific objectives of the challenge.
f6_assessments.q1: The viability of this project is average, in my opinion, but let's go in parts. Starting with the script, there is a schedule here that explains the main tasks to be carried out in the project, and this is done through bimesters, that is, what will happen in the first and second month / third and fourth. It is the beginning of what we need to understand how the development process of this project would take place, but the level of detail should be better. Since the project will last a total of 4 months and all activities will revolve around marketing, it would be quite possible for the team to provide us with a more detailed schedule. It could be divided by months and those months into weeks, pointing out exactly what would happen in each week. This way, we would have a more solid view of the project development process. Some of the tasks highlighted here are quite abstract, like the first one, which is to improve the design. I see that the page already has a designer and that she will continue to work on the team during the project, but what exactly does she intend to change in her work so that the profile view is better? What kind of improvements does it aim to establish and in what ways can it achieve them? A certain task is “designing goodies”, what do you mean? Were they perhaps gifts given to followers in some sort of contest? In the second quarter they say that they will distribute some gifts like hats, t-shirts and etc, to spread our blockchain. But we don't know exactly where these gifts would be distributed, who would receive them and so on. Could it be the followers themselves? Would the gifts be sent by mail or does the team intend to have a face-to-face meeting with people? I would like more clarification on some of the tasks performed during the project, to improve the general understanding. Regarding the budget, it is very detailed, which is a positive point, although the amount asked in my opinion is high for the project, some parts of the payment could also be better explained, such as “others” (we could have an idea more specific than that part would be). And about the team, finally, we have 3 people involved, a designer, the project manager and a logistics and purchasing specialist. Apart from the case of the manager, it is not very clear if other people have a solid involvement with the Cardano ecosystem, the designer would be responsible for the concept and look of the profile, but does she have any other connection with Cardano outside of this work on instagram? Does she actively work in the community? And about the purchasing and logistics specialist, it is not said at any time what his connection to our blockchain is. About this part, so I think there could be more clarity on this point and also a more detailed curriculum of the entire team, with the aim of increasing our confidence in their preparations to make the project work, in addition to their linkedin profiles, if any.
f6_assessments.q2: In my opinion, the auditability of this proposal is possible but not ideal. I say this because the team provides us with mostly numerical indicators to monitor the success of the project (number of new followers, number of new people on Telegram and increase in follower engagement). These are clear ways to see if the team's social media growth is succeeding, but we actually need to go further. I have two suggestions. In order to better understand the impact of the project, in addition to knowing how many more people are on social media, it would be interesting if we knew how they would be relating to the Cardano ecosystem. Did they start to acquire Ada, delegate them to some pool in our community? Have they become active participants in the sense of attending the various meetings of our community, such as the Town Halls? Do they now participate in Catalyst, are they aware of the existence of projects like the Catalys School that aim to help new members work with CAs, for example? It would be very positive for us to do a qualitative analysis, in addition to a quantitative one, of the new followers, so that we could more deeply measure the impact of this project on our blockchain. And in relation to the process, it is possible to monitor it properly, in my opinion, because there are two ways here: follow the Github that would be created and also if the tasks promised for each two months were being done on time and in the right way. It would be even better if the schedule was detailed in weeks and if the activities themselves were more broken down, as I explained in the analysis topic 2. However, I agree that, yes, there are possible ways to audit the process. So I'll give it 4 stars, since auditability can happen based on the information given, although it can be more efficient and detailed with some improvements.

f6_assessments.q0:
We realize that the proposal defined here fits the scope of the challenge, since it has the purpose of disseminating knowledge about Cardano in a new location that currently has little engagement. The main objective of the proposal is to increase the interest of the people of Indonesia in Cardano's ideals, through the growth of the CardanoIndonesia profile on instagram.

In this regard, we were able to perceive that the idea, although not necessarily innovative, has an important aspect for the medium/long term evolution of interest in the Cardano ecosystem in the region. The fact that the idea launched here is not so complex also matches the amount requested, $6000.

Thus, we will analyze if this amount is adequate for the steps to be developed during the project and if the strategies adopted and professionals involved can point out good practices for the growth of this instagram profile and, consequently, of Cardano in Indonesia.
f6_assessments.q1:
The proposal started with a good initial idea, and we were able to see that the concepts worked on in the topic ‘Feasibility’ are relevant and have, together, the real possibility of making the CardanoIndonesia profile reach greater visibility and relevance. The professionals involved also indicate that they have relevant experience for the activity, such as experience with graphic design by Olivia Priskie and with project management by Jordy Vincent.

In addition, LinkedIn addresses were provided for us to view their resumes. As a positive point, it is possible to say that the indicated knowledge of each professional can be used together and cover well the needs of the project at that moment.

We have that each phase and the budget assigned to each of them seems quite reasonable, for example, for the construction of the posts to be published I expect to spend a total of $900, for project management the forecast is $1000. What seems to be missing here is actually a stronger indicator of how these strategies will actually be executed.

For example, regarding the new posts that will be published, it would be possible to create some and make their images available in the proposal, so that we can better understand the new dissemination strategy and the persuasion that will be followed. Regarding the products that will be developed to promote Cardano, it would also be interesting to be able to visualize some of them, such as prototypes of the design of shirts and caps.

Given the other initiatives with similar purposes that are also in this category of challenge, a good idea would be to try to adopt a joint strategy with one of them.

In summary, we have that the objective steps are clear and have detail, but it would be interesting to improve them a little more.
f6_assessments.q2:
In the scope of how these achievements can actually be ascertained, very complex or elaborate metrics are not really necessary. Common indicators of engagement in a social network can be applied here to measure the efficiency of the strategies adopted.

In this context, ideas that were indicated by the authors of the proposal, such as verifying the increase in the number of followers on the instagram profile and also in the number of participants in the telegram group, can work as a parameter indicating the success or not of the project. However, the idea of ​​creating a github where people can check the progress is a little vague and could be more detailed.

Additionally, it would be interesting, as mentioned above, to seek partnerships with other projects from this or previous funds on how to increase engagement in locations where Cardano still does not have relevant penetration. This would be interesting, mainly because some ideas and concepts of the project were left vague.

f6_assessments.q0: Based on the proposal content, the target is to increase the participation of the local Indonesian Cardano community in Catalyst and/or Cardano ecosystem. This could be achieved via engaging more people in Instagram through Story/Post/IG Live. Other than that, the key metrics of the proposal also align with the outlined challenge settings, that is growth of local Cardano community in East Asia. So, I agree that this proposal solution really address the challenge.
f6_assessments.q1:
I know Jordy from Eastern Hemisphere Town Hall and he is also a regular speaker for Cardano Hub Indonesia workshops. And based on the proposal description, he & his team already manage the Instagram of Cardano Indonesia for quite some time. I think their team has sufficient experiences to make this project runs well.

Furthermore, the budget is broken down quite detailed. Starting from content production, interactive marketing up until content creation.

Jordy's proposal also includes realistic timeline (4 months) to do several interactives events via Instagram stories within these months. Including also the interactive marketing using promotional merchandise.

It's quite interesting also because the proposal also provide/identify the risks & challenges, so it shows that the team considered what to do if they face problems during the progress if they get funded.

I am quite optimistic that Jordy & his team will deliver the proposal on time and within the scope that the proposal has written. Therefore I give 5 stars for the feasibility.
f6_assessments.q2:
It's good that the proposal provided a clear roadmap for the 4 months (from May until August 2022), where the team described the delivery plan of their interactive events & marketing to promote Cardano & Catalyst. 

And the proposal includes also the KPI that define the success of the proposal in simple understandable bullets (number of followers, engagement level, etc.). 

The team also provide the link for Instagram and GitHub repository, where community could check the project progress. So that we could prove that their works are really done at the end. 

Aside from that, it would be great if the team provide numbers on their KPI, so public know how to measure their achievement (for example: increase new followers from 500 to 1000). I give 4 stars for the auditability based on my reasoning above.

f6_assessments.q0:
This proposal is focus on providing indonesian local language access and introduction to cardano space. The geographical location being in Asia and the population of indonisia is significant. 
The challenge to reach to the Asian community is therefore acheived effectively. 
In addition part of the challenge is not only to raise awareness but become a trustworthy community. This proposal aims to provide such safe welcoming atmosphere within their target group
f6_assessments.q1:
The proposal states that they have already started their project and acheived certain milestones (attracting 2000 users). This is a good vote of confidence to show that there is a good base for their project to stand on. 
The timeline and proposal are well defined with clear objectives over a range of areas (planning budget abd KPIs). I would emphasize a little more on the success factors to improve the auditibility of the project. for example I would include a target increase % of effective daily users. OR opening on several other platforms. 
The team that is well documentated on Linked in and the acheivements they presented shows that there is high probability of success for this proposal
f6_assessments.q2:
Overall project is easily auditiable becuase all the KPI's are public and can be reviewed. Also the project in all is made to increzse awareness and bring guidance to newcomers in the cardano ecosystem. The comment that i would add to improve is the actual figures or distinct milestones.
It was very clear within their budget the funds breakdown and the tasks needed to acheive. I would refer to some of those as KPIs for the audit of this proposal. I would like to see a second part of KPIs around the growth of the community daily activity on the social networks they will manage. This can be a great tool and relay back to the overall challenge. It will ensure the team is in line with the Grow Asia Challenge

f6_assessments.q0: Leveling up Cardano indonesia focus on a social media promotion on a specific platform. There is definitely a need for social media promotion. But im not entirely convinces that this is 100% in line with the challenge. in my opionion there would have been more alignment with a proposal that worked in conjunction with a local SPO that did some community workshops etc, and then posted this to an IG account. Thus i have to sit on the fence here purely on alignment.
f6_assessments.q1: It looks like the team have some experience in design and speaking. I cant see a link to a website. .which i think would be a good addition to a social media profile. They also suggest "Hire designer" which i would have thought Olivia could have taken care of this, some clarification on whether this is the designer would be good.
f6_assessments.q2: I dont think the team has given a clear set of metrics that they would be measuring against. A link to their IG profile is not sufficient. Some extra work here on a range of metrics and posted to a website or in some form for the community to gauge and the project to gauge its own success would be good (like a website with metrics or some data metrics provider)

f6_assessments.q0: Marketing of cardano products through visuals is important for the community. This is also more specific to using Instagram   to educate followers and getting new followers know for the first time about Cardano products. conscious marketing would make people curious to follow up with cardano, there by introducing new people to the community. This is addressing the challenge.
f6_assessments.q1:
Marketing is a tedious work but success results are milestones. This needs a great team to do that. Looking at the team, they have the experience to deliver on the project. The budget is equally reasonable but only 12 posts for 900 USD is quite huge. Unless that can further be justified. 

On the procurement of goodies like the T-shirts, keychains among others should have a clearer way of distributing them within the marketing value chain.
f6_assessments.q2:
Increasing the numbers on Instagram and telegram should be followed up with the of  followers who would be part of ideascale to help build the cardano ecosystem. Increase engagement has no focus on what exactly would be discussed.

Though numbers are important, impact of the numbers is  more significant to measure success. Transparency is important here and with GitHub one can verify for progress.

f6_assessments.q0: This project discusses about building Instagram for Indonesia community to learn about Cardano by creating content. Their goal is to build qualified content, attract newcomers and increase interactive followers and engagement from community on their channel by Instagram Story/Post/Live. I think this project will help a group of people to get to know more about Cardano, however I think this is not an innovative idea and its effect is not huge as it is only within Indonesia country.
f6_assessments.q1: I think it is possible to cary out this project as the task is not very hard for the team members. The team shows experience in the field of graphic design, business development. The proposal provides plan for the first four month. However, I would like to see more KPIs and more posts on Instagram by the teams. Also, the proposal gives detailed budget for executing this project which I think is quite clear.
f6_assessments.q2: It is easy to check the progress of the project by visiting their Instagram  , Github and Cardano forum. By that, community could check their number of posts and interactions with community. Also, based on the number of increased new comers or followers, we could see how well the team is doing.

f6_assessments.q0:
The basic idea behind the proposal is pretty good, let's upgrade Cardano's Instagram page to reach and engage more people in Indonesia. The advantage of the proposal is that the group already has an Instagram page with more than 2000 followers. I also went to Instagram.com/CardanoIndonesia for reference and saw that this page was established about 1 year ago, has a stable number of interactive people. The proposed solution is "interactive marketing", although the goal of the proposal is interesting, I think it is important to improve the details of the solution to the challenge, which needs to be explained. Learn more about how marketing your product will relate to the growth of Cardano. In addition, this proposal identifies the main risk of this project is that not many people are interested in this campaign, but their workaround is "attempt to interact" is still not really convincing.
If the proposal is not funded at this fund, I strongly encourage the proponent to rewrite the idea with the mindset to add diversity and new ways to do things for our community, to get a higher score next time, I suggest you include the mentioned aspects like the risk of the challenge, the clear KPI as well as what your post will cover, for the Audience like how?
f6_assessments.q1:
What I know about the team is that it consists of 3 people: Jordy Vincent, Olivia Priskie, and Bob Lukitoro, they have the necessary skills and experience to execute the proposal. The community can also easily dig into members based on the Linkedin link that the proposal provides.
The proposal provides a 4-month roadmap with detailed plans that make it easier for the community to visualize the work they will be doing. The budget given is reasonable and clearly explained. However, to be more convincing, I think the proposal needs to be more specific about what information your article will include, posted in the form of images, videos, or videos about Cardano….
f6_assessments.q2: A section on Measuring Success was provided, but linking challenge metrics and KPIs was missing. Therefore, it is not possible to determine the data required to evaluate auditability. Here are some recommendations the author should consider in the future: Create a roadmap that explains the steps that must be taken for this proposal to be successful. Furthermore, it is essential to establish some success metrics and link them to dates, for example, when small live events through Instagram will take place; how many new members will join the IG page, where will the profit from buying and selling products go, and what will you do next to maintain IG in the future....

f6_assessments.q0: As a 10 years marketing expert I believe that this idea will help to attract lightly to the communities in Indonesia. The proposer wants to improve their current Instagram account of Cardano to reach more and engage more followers. As I checked their Instagram, I think that the content was invested carefully to help everyone understand and get the info easier. But I think the team should provide more detail about their way to develop this idea to get better results than just brief shortly in the Interactive Marketing. For ex: the concept, the topic, the style, media, design... that they want to direct the current Instagram to be. That will help us assess better how it will impact the community. The team also describes the potential challenge but they don't have a plan to solve it.
f6_assessments.q1: The team provides a plan with clear milestones that I believe it's will work. Moreover, that plan fits with the budget that they require and breakdown into positions. And the info of the team is enough for that roadmap. But as I said at the impact session, they should give us more content about the implementation plan that will be easier for CA to assess their feasibility.
f6_assessments.q2: For this project, the main tracking asset is their Instagram account. They also put their progress on the Github repository. So the community can track well their work. The team also describes the image of their success but I suppose that for a marketing campaign like this they should give us some numbers of KPIs - this will inspire the community to support them.

f6_assessments.q0: As far as I know, Instagram is a social network specializing in sharing photos and videos, itself designed based on creating beautiful images and attracting the community. For a short time, users are very passionate about Instagram because it also offers a lot of different photo and video editing modes according to the user's preferences. Reaching and engaging more people through CardanoIndonesia Instagram is a big deal in this challenge. This proposal effectively tackles the challenge, which if funded could provide a good impact for the Cardano community. There is a clear alignment between the mission of this proposal and I fully agree that this challenge is crucial to achieving Cardano's mission. The proposal also identifies potential risks and challenges that team members may face when developing the project. This solution shows a clear expected impact on the Cardano ecosystem in the short and long term.
f6_assessments.q1: This proposal describes the roadmap and implementation timeline clearly. Although the timeline shown is at least 4 months, I see they have a very detailed list of to-dos for each month. The budget is allocated in a very detailed way that is broken down to each stage such as content production for Instagram posts, social networks, project management, designers, interactive marketing, giveaways... Reasonable and clear budget allocation increases the credibility of the proposal. Team members consist of 3 people who are assigned jobs that match their current experience. The team did a good job in presenting their credentials clearly on their LinkedIn profile but here I only see Jordy Vincent with an avatar and Olivia Priskie and Bob Lukitoro don't see their pictures on the profile of the project owner If you update your image on it, I think the credibility for the group will be more. (this is my suggestion)
f6_assessments.q2: Allowing the community to monitor and measure through the website https://www.instagram.com/cardanoindonesia has proven that the project works. This will provide traceability of the work as it progresses. Reaching new people to let them know Instagram is a difficult problem that the author needs to solve. A sound plan for implementing the proposal and providing steps to follow are important. I fully agree that the information provided is sufficient to audit the progress and success of this proposal. This project is brand new and unfunded.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposer identifies the problem clearly, where the Instagram of Cardano Indonesia need more reach to masses and they will do interactive marketing approach as solution. With simple local language, merchandising, and interactive content the proposer aim to reach more masses and new comers which should benefit the Cardano Community as a whole. This proposal are align with the challenge to bring more awareness among the East Asia about Blockchain and Cardano, although after checking the Instagram content should have more general understanding about Blockchain tech and not only siloed within Cardano alone. The proposer seems not really convinced with the solution offered and stating this atleast they are engaging with the followers, as CA i would recommend they measure the campaign feedback and have a plan B if doest work as planned - and try to manage the risk in procuring the merchandise so they can adapt to the situation.
f6_assessments.q1:
The proposer give the Instagram link and i have checked using the tools available in Internet for fake followers (https://www.inbeat.co/fake-follower-checker/), the result are just passed 6.1 score, which quite good comparing to other similar IG account. The team was checked through linkedIN and the experience of digital marketing are still lacking, they might want to work with more proffesional team or consultant to get some insight on their plan - althogh they have some experience in logistics and procurement so purchase and distributing the merchandise correctly and efficiently should not be a problem.
The budget given looks reasonably in mid-range, and a bit low for project management to maintain a social media platform if they want to scale for the masses.
Detailed plan are given with enough information to track this project implementation in monthly basis, although they did not mention the risks and how to mitigate them if the plan are not going as they planned.
f6_assessments.q2: Proposer share enough milestone to achieve and easly can track them using a github under the Cardano Indonesia repo, but there is no quantitative KPI to measure such as % growth expected vs actual and how to improve in the future, As CA i would suggest the KPI would be in numbers (achieavable yet clear) to help them improve the IG in the future, they should also remove the telegram members measurement since this proposal are focused for the Instagram platform.

f6_assessments.q0: Indonesia is potential place due their crypto adoption (source Tokenomy: Indonesia Crypto Investor report), since investors concentrated at age 20-30 years old. With these data, this proposal are focusing to reach more new followers / members from millenials. This proposal answers the challenge appropriately. The proposal aiming to introduce Cardano and its ecosystem to Indonesian people with interactive marketing, which I believe it is the perfect strategy for this project.
f6_assessments.q1: The budget is explained and makes sense for their interactive marketing strategy. References, links, realistic schedules, and other evidence are sufficient to confirm this proposal is valid. To be more interactive, I think the proposer can add some collaboration with other media or communities to expand their reach to potential new followers/members.
f6_assessments.q2: Very well explained. Through all of the information given, we can have solid understanding about what they will run.. I believe the auditabily is perfect, no need to criticize.

f6_assessments.q0: Great proposal, ideally we should have this as part of educational and marketing tool across every region with a dialect and culture. An example of marketing material would work great to showcase future content and ways of bridging Cardanos innovation with media exposure in that region within this proposal. Great initiative!
f6_assessments.q1: There is an existing working page with achieved number of visitors. The experience appears fitting between marketing/managing role and graphic designer. More clarity on qualifications and/or years in. a similar role can strengthen that position as well as perhaps an addition of technical person that can educate into the ins and out of blockchain and how it can be used to the average person to onboard more of the wider community would be instrumental in the growth of that hub.
f6_assessments.q2: The key performance indicators require more robust approach to organically grown audience. Quality as presented is a given in this proposal but ways to onboard users by perhaps number of wallets created would be interesting approach, some polls within that media branch can ask at different time frames a host of question to assess if individuals are NFT holders, is cardano their first ever crypto, what got them to crypto, are you a DeFi user, or part of stakepools with a purpose type directive that can better assess their interests and vision within Cardano.

f6_assessments.q0: I think the proposal has a possibility of reach many people who don't know the Cardano and because of that it can cause a good impact in Indonesia that is the fourth more habiteted country in the world with 230 millions of habitants. I believe that to increase this impact, the Instagram profile could talk about our community of Ideascale in order to bring more and more people to contribute to Cardano ecosystem. The problem the proposal deals is a real one and nowadays the Instagram is being an excellent platform to deliver relevant contents to people and many times to young people that have a interest on cryptocurrencies. The exposed goals are coherent to the proposed solution and this proposal can scale to address future challenges.
f6_assessments.q1: The plan of the proposal and the timeline seems to be coherent to the idea of sharing contents and deliver information and knowledge about Cardano using the Instagram. The budget was broken down in identifiable items but I wonder if is there not a way to produce more posts spending a smaller amount of money per post. Because it's known that on Instagram the frequency is very important to increase the number of followers and create a connection with them. Because of that, it's also very relevant posting stories everyday. In addition, I think the proposers could think about selling something on the Instagram profile that ensures its sustainability to keep investing in better posts, online events and campaigns. In conclusion, the proposal presents feasibility but can be improved even more if the proposers thought about these points above.
f6_assessments.q2: It's relatively easy to audit this proposal success because the Instagram is a platform that has many metrics that can be transformed to KPI's that can measure the project progress and success such as number of new followers in a specific deadline, the percentual of engagement (mentioned on the proposal). In addition, the roadmap with milestones is clear and coherent with the proposal goals and the project is very reasonable to decrease the problem about lack of information about Cardano to people from Indonesia.

f6_assessments.q0: I believe that this proposal effectively addresses the challenge setting because the proposers are growing their social media account to promote learning about Cardano in Indonesia. Indonesia is a huge market for Cardano because there are many people who could get involved in many different ways, from general users, to stake pool operators, to proposers. Social media is a great way to attract newcomers because there are no boundaries with social media – the proposers can interact with people all throughout Indonesia on social media, so they aren’t limited to only in-person content or events. Awareness leads to more users, which eventually will lead to the desired outcomes that the challenge setting aims to achieve. While it may take a while, slowly building the user base of Cardano into Indonesia will greatly benefit the Cardano ecosystem. Good engagement, which it seems like the proposers have already started on, will be important to encourage an engaged user base who will want to participate in the ecosystem. I agree with the proposers in that it may be challenging to reach new users since they might not be interested in Cardano simply because they do not know about it. However, the proposers could potentially use some other methods, in combination with their current social media accounts, to reach out to new Indonesian communities. I would encourage the proposers to consider using their account to reach out to other groups and organizations, such as schools or community groups to build relationships. This way, the proposers aren’t casting a net out into the void of social media and hoping to catch a few individuals here or there. (score given: 4)
f6_assessments.q1: Given the information about the proposers, I do think that this proposal will be successfully implemented. Combined, the proposers all have necessary skills that will be needed to make this proposal come to life (business development, graphic design, logistics, etc.). Given the details about the project, I think that the proposal will be successful. The proposers have listed out a solid roadmap for the 4 months that will be funded. The proposers have set realistic goals that can be achieved in the given timeframes, such as the two bi-weekly posts and the merchandise creation. The proposers have also provided a good breakdown of the funds needed to complete this project. While I do not have prior experience in social media marketing, the funds requested seem reasonable for the scope of the project. The proposers have considered some potential challenges they might face, but they have not exactly mentioned how they could counteract those challenges (reaching out to new community members – see my impact rationale for a potential solution). I also do have one question for the proposers: How exactly do they plan to give out the merchandise they create? If they are operating from behind a social media account, will they ship the goodies to fans? Or will there eventually be in-person events? If the proposers could answer this question, it would greatly strengthen the proposal. (score given: 4)
f6_assessments.q2: The proposers have provided some good information to audit the success of this proposal, but they are lacking other pieces of information that would lead to more complete auditability. What I do like is that they not only have the roadmap that the community can see and check on, but they also have listed a couple KPIs to track the progress of the proposal (increased followers, increased engagement, and increased telegram members). The proposers have acknowledged that it is hard to justify success for this kind of project, but I would encourage the proposers to set more numerically based KPIs, such as a specific target goal of how many additional followers per month, rather than just a vague “increase.” In my mind, any specific number would be sufficient. This way, the cardano community can have more concrete evidence to see that the proposal was successful. Also, people can’t see the statistics of a social media account unless they are the owners of the account, so I would encourage the proposers to share out metrics with the cardano community to keep them updated about the progress of the proposal. (score given: 3)

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal aims to meet the challenge by producing quality translations and social media and live event content for Indonesia, alongside branded merchandise. This group has already amassed over 2000 followers on Instagram, and this is a great proposal to keep them incentivized to continue and reach even more people.
f6_assessments.q1: The team has already proven experience and have grown their Instagram account to 2000 people in a year. This is pretty solid evidence that they have the experience required to continue to grow their reach and impact with the team adding live events and merchandise to the mix. The amounts requested are very reasonable and seems to be a much better investment for return than in other countries.
f6_assessments.q2:
While there seems to have been some thought put into measuring success, the three KPIs listed: 

- Increased new followers of Cardano Indonesia Instagram
- Increased engagement Level
- Increase of Telegram members of Cardano Indonesia

only state "increase" and not a measurable number. Having a target goal would make it much more measurable how successful this proposal will be.

The visibility of the Instagram account, posted content, github repo and Cardano forum updates is good for tracking their progress. Although actually measuring the impact of this proposal in more concrete terms for Catalyst such as:

- number of new proposers in Indonesia
- number of new CAs in Indonesia
- etc

would have been nice to see. And perhaps the team can think about more objective measures of success to use when they report back to the community,

f6_assessments.q0: The Proposal mentions the fact that it is necessary to level up the Cardano Indonesia Instagram to reach out and engage more masses. They plan to do interactive marketing which is a combination of visualized content and campaigns and also do content creation about Cardano. This proposal aims to raise the followers on Cardano IG. The proposer once established IG for Cardano Indonesian team in Feb 2021. At that time, they couldn’t find a community where they can learn about Cardano in simple terms. It is hard to seek for credible resources to learn about Cardano in Indonesian language, that’s why they triggered the start of Cardano Indonesia Instagram. After 01 year, the IG reaches 2000 followers, which makes the proposer very surprised. However, they feel that they are in the stagnant phase, where they need to reach out to more masses, so it’s important to level up IG in order to attract newcomers to know more about Cardano. The IG will also help to engage with the current existing followers. The team joined in the proposal has experience in Business Development & Project Management, Graphic & Interior Design, Content Creation. They are also parts of Cardano Hub Jakarta Meetup Speaker. Therefore, they can be suitable with solving the problem set up in this proposal.
f6_assessments.q1: The writer has run the IG for 1 year and hence he has some experiences on which main item should consider when levelling up the IG. The budget for this project is expectedly 6000 USD, divided into 4 months. The estimated costs include fee for Instagram content production around 12 posts), social media maintenance, Project management, hiring designer for content, interactive marketing & designing goodies, interactive Marketing, Miscellaneous. As for me, this division is logical. The Plan is logical with step by step target after 4 months, covering improving the design visualization, starting campaign through the posts, doing interactive events with followers, doing small live events through IG. The writers admit the challenge but cannot have the definitive solutions. They consider the main challenge for this project is that not many newcomers are interested in this campaign. However, they cannot commit whether the number of newcomer will raise after running the project, they just mention in general that at least they manage to engage with the current followers.
f6_assessments.q2: The Proposal is described clearly and the solution method is easily understood. The project is drafted in details for 4 months of leveling up. The criteria to evaluate the success is the increase of new followers, engagement level, the Cardano team members. If the writer describes more particularly the number (i.e. 1000 newcomers after running the project), it can be more reliable.

f6_assessments.q0:
This proposal focuses on giving the content of Cardano in simple terms to Indonesians, which addresses the adoption of Cardano to the newcomers in Indonesia as part of East Asia. This project would be great as they help common people to understand Cardano since the materials now existed are usually heavy on technical terms. 

However, there are no metrics introduced other than “12 high-quality posts” in 3 months. The proposer would be best to give the topics of each of the 12 posts they have in mind, so the voters can see better how the campaign will run and effectively attract the crowds. The proposer should also think about the balance in terms of “simple” and “quantity” in Marketing; whereas “heavier” should be combined in “lower” quantity, and “simple” should be balanced with “more” quantity. As a marketing effort proposed by the team, the proposer should be better to produce at least 1 post a week, or even better 2-posts each week. The frequent exposure to more posts in simple terms will reach the marketing goal better.
f6_assessments.q1:
This project is feasible to be finished within the timeline, budget, and team proposed, with some notes of improvements below.

The proposer provides a link to their product at **Instagram.com/CardanoIndonesia**, which (upon quick inspection) can be improved much better on the content rather than on their design, especially with the number of typos, heavy technical terms unexplained in the same post, and the conciseness of the explanation. The design would also be improved by introducing a better color scheme to get rid of the gloomy/dark appearance. The Proposer could also improve this proposal greatly by mentioning the content ideas for the 12 posts that they are planning.

The small team that this proposer has should be adequate to run the project, though someone can be added to curate the content (the typos at the very least), as we, in general, want the audience to have the image of Cardano as something robust and well-thought.

The budget is outlined with details only on some items, which could be greatly improved by showing the number of goods/merchandise that is targeted (i.e.: how many clothing goodies, or mugs they are planning to make). The budget on some items looks meager but should work well in their area (Indonesia). 

Timeline is sensible, although would be a lot better in the sense of marketing that plan for Month 4 (Merchandising) is put in the beginning, or incorporated within Month 1-3, as Marketing with Merchandise will attract a lot of crowds, which would start (and hopefully stay) to read the posts.
f6_assessments.q2:
The proposal stated some numbers in other parts, but none at all in the auditability part, hence it will be hard to measure the success level of this proposal.

The proposer provides metrics to define the success of the proposal, but without any number at all to define both the current condition and also the targeted number that could be the milestones. All the metrics are actually quantifiable/can be measured in simple numbers (amount of new followers, engagement level, number of Telegram members). The proposer would be best to introduce a roadmap with measurable numbers that serve as milestones in this part of the proposal.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposer meets the criteria of the challenge and is focused on increasing the awareness of Cardano across Indonesia.  Utilizing the instagram platform is logical since 30% of the poplution is on instagram and the proposer already has 2,000+ followers.  Additional content and frequency of information should increase followers.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer has provided a monthly milestone road map which seems achievable and has specific details on the use of funds.  While the team appears to have full time employment outside of this project the scope of the project and milestones all seem to be reasonable for the team to complete.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposer has provided a clear method (instagram followers) to measure the success of the awareness campaign.  I would like to see a way for the team to provide feedback through a dahsboard on the number of posts and outreach activities however the simple metric on new followers is likely sufficient.  The proposer does acknowledge the challenge of measure success with new followers and other CAs may be able to provide some thoughts on campaign measurements.

f6_assessments.q0: Social media has a huge impact on Indonesian society. https://www.statista.com/statistics/278341/number-of-social-network-users-in-selected-countries/ says Indonesia have more than 236 million active social media users and ranks fourth among the countries with the highest number of social media users worldwide (below China, India, and United States). And Youtube had the largest social media penetration rate in Indonesia of about 94 percent. And many business have turned on social media as a part of their marketing strategies. So I suggest that you also consider other social media platforms due to growing competition. You may upload the Full Videos to Facebook and make short explanation/trailer for Instagram Reels, Tiktok and YouTube Shorts.
f6_assessments.q1: The process of making educational content is tricky. Each platform has a unique type of audience so we need to adapt the material and delivery style to the Indonesian audience. I have 2 suggestions so the program can have a bigger impact. The first is alocate budget to subscribe to instagram analytics like squarelovin or analyze.io to analyze social activity and performance of your own to make more discoverable content using optimize caption and hashtags. My second suggestion is to collaborate with Discord Cardano Indonesia and provide mentorship so that those who are interested can ask further questions (DC : https://discord.gg/R4s4Vh65pB). Using analytics tools also help you to increase engagement rate that means readers will follow both of Instagram and Discord. Finally , since Proposer already manage the Instagram, I’m sure that Proposer already have motivation and discipline to continue what they’re doing. The fund will help them to build better team and make better content to their followers.
f6_assessments.q2: Instagram content creation can be audited easily. we just check the posting date on Instagram page. And many people like giveaway event and proposers can sharing swag items (tshirt, sticker, keychain) with active participants without additional cost. However, we must encourage the winner to sharing their experience through Instagram and other social media platform so their first-tier friend will know and may participate in the next interactive event.

f6_assessments.q0: The explanation by the proposer in this section addresses the challenge of socializing and attracting people's interest in the cardano blockchain using Instagram. We also know that most millennials in Indonesia are Instagram users and the largest population in Indonesia now is this millennial. In my opinion, other methods can be added to this marketing process, because providing merchandise usually only has a momentary effect. There has to be something that makes them more interested, for example by collaborating with influencers and also collaborating with local SPOs with creative programs so that the implementation and use of cardano by interacting followers can be better and it is likely to be referred to other friends.
f6_assessments.q1: In line with the previous explanation, the details and the amount of the budget certainly need to be changed according to my suggestion, for example the use of influencers and collaboration with SPO. The target is of course more and more followers and interactions on the Cardano Indonesia Instagram account. In addition to providing merchandise in the form of goods, wouldn't it be better if it was in the form of ADA or other cardano tokens? How Instagram works also needs to be studied which is always evolving, currently the reels feature can reach more interactions.
f6_assessments.q2: I agree with the explanation in this auditable section. Because of course the addition of followers that will be seen. It would be even better if on github there was an explanation about the use of funds so that project progress can be monitored with the community and can be shared via the telegram group cardano indonesia.

f6_assessments.q0: With most information content about cardans being in English it excludes people who are not fluent in the language or have some kind of information about the ecurrency. Creating a platform where the people of a whole nation can get informed and participate is a big gain to the Cardano community. The platform is already up and running but needs to be pushed forward specially considering the ever changing algorithms of social media platforms. Getting the funding for this project can insure that the platform reaches a large audience and delivers information in a creative and captivating matter
f6_assessments.q1:
The team working on the project are well rounded covering the creative  aspect also the marketing and project management aspect.  
The budget is well thought out,clear, and reasonable. 
The project is already up and running which gives the possibility of success a higher rate.
f6_assessments.q2: The information provided is detailed and clear. Implementation is straightforward and achievable. However because there are no exact numbers presented on what the reach they are hoping for is, it is not possible to measure the level of success. I.G if it is mentioned that by the first 6 months they are looking to reach a specific number of followers, shares and saves on insta that would be something easy enough to audit and measure. f6_assessments.q0:
The need for an Instagram upgrade to reach and engage more followers through Instagram Story / Post / Live aligns with Cardano's growth goals.
Proposal to have a plan to implement interactive marketing with clear specific content and visualization campaigns. f6_assessments.q1:

The roadmap is 4 months to implement from improving the design image to interactive events with followers, merchandise shopping, or small events... to attract followers, I think if there is a reference image here will convince me more.
The budget is relatively low $ 6000 but lists specific, reasonable amounts.

f6_assessments.q2: The project is also in the process of development, through the Instagram channel, it is not much possible to monitor and measure the interaction of the community on it. The road to success is quite long, I think in addition to strengthening the community to increase the number of members, the proponent should make more detailed plans and progress for the next phase. Grow and engage a community on your Instagram channel, it's a good idea. I appreciate your efforts, this is a great start to building and growing the community. I support you.

f6_assessments.q0:
If the Cardano community sponsors Instagram in this proposal, I think it is very good for the Cardano community to develop.
I found the team to have a clear interactive plan and solve the problem of this challenge, a very reasonable solution for Cardano.
“This solution has a clear impact on the Cardano ecosystem, there is a defined risk, this proposal is a big exposure attracting many people to know about Cardano
f6_assessments.q1: The roadmap describes the time in detail, clearly stating the specific milestones for each month, the remaining goal is to have the above-mentioned monthly solutions. Proposing to identify risks and challenges to find hidden team members may encounter during project development. the solution has a clear impact on the Cardano ecosystem. The team consists of 3 people. The team also has a clear analysis for each proposal, I find the team has a lot of experience to support the next new project.
f6_assessments.q2:
For the community to monitor and measure through the website, proving that the project is implemented
Measuring progress through Instagram, there are many options to solve for a reasonable proposal
This is a completely new unfunded proposal.

f6_assessments.q0: The intention of this proposal is to improving content on an already existing social media platform. The team hopes to improve content and increase subscription to their platform. They also want to develop a range of Cardono based merchandise with the hope of organically raising  awareness of Cardono. I feel that there is not enough detail within the proposal to accurately judge the impact of some aspects of the proposal. The Instagram channel as it stands is of good visual quality and in itself displays relevant impact to the community it serves. Improving the reach of this work would have a positive impact on the Cardano ecosystem and encourage new member onboarding. I don’t believe there is enough detail about how the merchandise is to be used. Is it to be given away to subscribers? Used as incentive for interaction with the platform? Or simply sold for profit? With more detailed explanation the impact of this aspect of the proposal could be judged more clearly.
f6_assessments.q1: Part of the Funding proposal is to support the creation of content for an already existing social media platform. The team have already taken the initiative to create and run this platform. The requested funding would support this initiative and give opportunity to expand upon the quality of the content. With the teams experience of creating content for this platform there is no reason to believe this area of a  Proposal would not be fulfilled . The budget for the merchandise is not detailed enough. For example information like number of items and number of proposed designs would be necessary to gauge whether the budget is sufficient for the task. This obviously has a huge impact on weather the proposal can be implemented successfully. More details of all the aspects relating to merchandise would be needed to potentially gain a higher star rating for this section. The idea has potential it just needs laying out more clearly.
f6_assessments.q2:
I feel the proposal as a whole needs a little more thought and detail. For example The budget contains an allowance for hiring a designer to help with several aspects of the proposal. In the timeline there is no mention of on boarding a designer and design work for the project is scheduled in month 1. The idea of organic marketing is sound. With a more thought out and detailed proposal there would be a high likelihood of receiving an improved rating.
Auditing the production of instagram posts would be easily achieved as the quantity and time of posts has been clearly stated.

f6_assessments.q0: For Cardano to thrive, it is extremely important to popularize it into languages ​​so that many countries can easily access Cardano. with the idea of ​​Upgrade, CardanoIndonesia IG is a very good idea, the proposed content is, the problem of Indonesian people not being able to access Cardano because of the language barrier, the problem is very clearly defined to upgrade Instagram to Cardano chat in the simplest way in Indonesia. This problem I find very relevant to the future challenge. the team has put it to the test and achieved great results, answered the questions posed by the challenge, but in my opinion, it would be better if it was tested more widely, this project of the team would be more convincing. I think this proposal can be replicated to solve future challenges, in terms of solutions, there are specific, clear, and suitable solutions to solve. are the challenges of the future. However, the solution presented is a bit sketchy and no concrete evidence or research has been provided. Expect the group to come up with a more specific solution, besides the group has also outlined how to manage the problem. It is worth your risk. Not many people were interested in the campaign and the group also came up with a plan to deal with its risks. I just want to add that for more people to be interested in the campaign, the advertising medium is equally important, I appreciate the idea of ​​the team.
f6_assessments.q1: about the group's planning progress. I see the team has outlined a specific timeline. is divided into four stages. I think the four stages as stated are reasonable for completing the outlined tasks. but the group only said in general that it will be completed in 4 months, but did not specify when to start implementing the plan. however, the goals of each phase were very specific and clear. The project's progress is also easily checked and tracked by the community. with a budget of close to 5% of the total challenge budget and already broken down into the amounts as outlined in the proposal, I find that reasonable. However, it is necessary to plan in case additional budget is needed. about group members. I see that the group has three members and has specific tasks assigned to each member, although the members are a bit small. I find the capacity of the members is quite good, their experience and qualifications have been recognized. and the identity of each person has been verified. References are attached below the links. I find this project very doable.
f6_assessments.q2: in the description of measuring the progress and development of the project. I see the group has outlined a number of indicators quite clearly with certain goals in place. The metrics are also quite easy to check by the community by visiting the link, about the success of the project, the team has not achieved any specific success will achieve but only estimates that success will be. achieve in the future I need the team to have a specific report on success if this project of the group is approved and implemented. The important thing is that the project has never been tested in practice, because this is a new project, so it has never been funded, but I believe this project is also quite good, if it succeeds, it will be very suitable for challenges. Future. I hope the group will receive a lot of support from the community so that the project can be put into practice soon.

f6_assessments.q0: i have check their progress as a community, and the cardano indonesia is a country based community. they are helping each other and sharing good informations, i saw many of their group in telegram and discord. some of them create another groups for cardano NFT indonesian community. their progress is effective and very rapid.
f6_assessments.q1: the budgets is relatively low, but i can saw the price is reasonable for south east asia country. the budget is also within limit and fully support their project until functional.their team member is very active in the community and has the experience to speak and sharing the informations needed to help the community to grow.
f6_assessments.q2: i would like to see actual numbers, such as numbers of new follower/numbers of people increased in their community. most importantly is the number of exposure for their marketing project. their website and community is running and growing rapidly.

f6_assessments.q0: Team is using instagram, github and meetings to engage the indonesian community. IG has 2K followers and github is limited to 3 to 5 members. The team has to track how they use their traffic from IG to other Cardano websites.
f6_assessments.q1: Experience - strong, Cost - Significantly lower compared to western world, Plan - Good : Team has used the IG platform and meetings to onboard more local Indonesian community. Team has to explore the opportunities in project catalyst as well as IOHK youtube channel for taking next steps to create more engaged locals who can play in the global needs.
f6_assessments.q2: Auditable: Very strong tracking - Team is clearly documenting their steps in weekly meetings and IG posts are good. Team should take advantage of some of the other posts and convert to Indonesian language.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal addresses the problem, which is the lack of reliable social media accounts to attract 170 million social media users in Indonesia about Cardano. As Facebook is a social media with the most active user in Indonesia, the team could reach more newcomers by using the combination of Facebook and Instagram. Considering the primary purpose is to reach out to newcomers about Cardano, the proposal does not address the solution more aggressively if there are not many newcomers that are not interested in this campaign.
f6_assessments.q1: The team has shown to have enough skill by creating Cardano Indonesia Instagram account with many followers. The team also put up a plan for getting this done, and the milestone looks doable with a reasonable budget. Albeit that, there is still a lack of detail about the plan. The team needs to explain what kind of content will be posted and what type of live event will be held. The team can also set a target for how many Instagram account reached and engaged in this project.
f6_assessments.q2: The audibility of this project is quite measurable as Instagram provides the number of accounts reached, engaged, and the number of new followers to the Instagram account that the team can display at the Cardano Forum.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposers have clearly stated that there is a leveling up issue that can be solved through interactive marketing and other means using their existing 2000 followers on instagram. The proposal will have a positive impact on cardano ecosystem in a specific country (Indonesia) through the proposers postings, content creation, and campaign on behalf of cardano.
f6_assessments.q1: The team is well qualified to perform the tasks described in the proposal.  They have the means and the experience.  The timeline is clearly stated as well as the deliverables.  All are in accord with the KPIs.  The budget is reasonable and there is clarity based on the way it is broken down.  The proposers already have established resources to promote cardano and they will use metrics provided to make cardano community aware of the project's success.
f6_assessments.q2: A roadmap is aligned with the timeline and deliverables.  Proposers will provide metrics of success through Githum repository.  The proposal can be a success based on the detailed information the proposers provided.

f6_assessments.q0:
The proposal is for general education about Cardano. It does not attempt to make a dApp. 

The proposal does not seem very repeatable, which is another goal of the challenge. It is very focused on the Indonesia and appealing to young people there. 

The idea helps nation building by honoring the Indonesian identity.
f6_assessments.q1:
The team has had good success building community and engagement to this point. They propose using the same techniques and structure, which seems smart.

Culture changes, populations change, those things are unpredictable, so plans may have to change. The team seams culturally aware and sensitive; that flexibility will be important as the project unfolds.
f6_assessments.q2:
The program is all about Instagram engagement. This will make tracking engagement public. The accountability this brings will make auditing easier and more effective. 

Because the team intends to continue tracking data points that they already have been tracking progress will be very clear to see, and see over time.

The plan is sufficient to audit the progress and success of the proposal.

f6_assessments.q0:
Although the proposal effectively addresses the challenge, I do believe that the amount of potential impact is slightly limited. 
I only say this because Instagram does not aid peer to peer interactions on a larger scale. 
Since Cardano Indonesia already has other socials like Discord, YouTube, Twitter etc. I'd have loved to see IG posts with action items that lead the community to interact with each other on some of the other platforms as well. This keeps the community more involved while giving the team enough time to come up with the next idea for posting.
For example, during one of the IG live sessions, you can offer a free Cardano Indonesia T-shirt/Mug raffled to one lucky winner amongst everyone that joins the discord group. Same with Twitter followers.
To add to that, I noticed that the YouTube channel already has 17 subscribers even without any content posted. Based on this, I assume there is a demand for youtube content. I really do think recording live IG sessions and posting them on YouTube is a zero cost way to increase content interactions on YouTube.
f6_assessments.q1:
The team seems well equipped to implement the proposal based on their roles and experience. They also have a track record of creating IG posts although the video content seems to be slightly limited.
The cost for each post is $75 which seems a little steep for a post but makes sense for video or live content.
It’d also help assess the proposal better if the ‘project management’ budget is broken down further.
f6_assessments.q2:
The reason I have given a lower rating for auditability is that there is no internal assessment and pivoting process involved. For example, if a specific IG post or story receives more interactions than others in the previous weeks, maybe the future posts should take from this and make necessary changes. 
This helps the auditing team understand that your process is flexible and is constantly taking input from your audiences.
Also it’d really help if there are analytical details presented that compare interactions before fund 8 and after fund 8.

f6_assessments.q0:
The proposers have a good initiative they intend to embark on. This is because the challenge, 'levelling up cardano Indonesia IG' is a way to broadcast the message of Cardano. However, I think their problem wasn't properly stated. They couldn't state clearly the problem and how they intend to use their Instagram page to solve the problem.

Since this is about mass education, I suggest they could have used all social media to do the mass education. However, if there are reasons they want to go by Instagram then I suggest they spell it out so it can be clear.

The proposers from what I read said having live interactions or marketing is their main solution to the problem. I however think that just providing one solution key solution isn't enough. Their method of engaging and at the same time maintaining followers might also not work and so it needs to be looked out well. 

I however score them 4 because I agree that the challenge in levelling up cardano is a good one but needs to be relooked at especially with to provide a strong problem statement that addresses the challenge.
f6_assessments.q1: The presented plan is well laid out unless the problem statement I think should have been broad as well as the methodology to include other sucial media handles eg Facebook and Twitter. The proposers also have an appreciable level of experience on Project catalyst. This will be good to give a good interaction sessions on the social media.
f6_assessments.q2:
The proposer provided a timeline for the execution of the project what is however missing is the KPIs and how they intend to dwell on their experiences in Cardano to ensure the project goals are achieved. The budget allocations were not also specific. You must work to bring clarity to the entire community. 
The proposers didn't also bring out possible challenges they might face in this project. They could work to add up the challenges so it helps gives a clear picture to anyone who reads it. I therefore rate this proposal 4.

solution: We plan to do interactive marketing which is a combination of visualized content and campaigns and also do content creation about Cardano.
experience: The team has experience in Business Development & Project Management, Graphic & Interior Design, Content Creation, and is also part of Cardano Hub Jakarta Meetup Speaker.
